event.title: Indian Super League Schedule 2017
event.description:
Under-17 team more likely to play with Mali and Malaysia: With India U-17 mentor Luis Norton de Matos not prepared for taking his children to Australia on another publicity trip as a consequence to extreme climate, the AIFF will probably set up two friendlies against Mali and Malaysia for the colts prior to the Under-17 World Glass, starting from Oct 6. “The friendlies will be played out before Sept 6. The location may very well be Goa,” Das said.
Deadline lengthened for new I-League team bids: The deadline to send bids for new I-League clubs, which was formerly on Sunday, has been expanded to Sept 8. “Were in no rush. We wished to ensure that interested functions get plenty of time before submitting the bids. We will start the bids on Sept 15,” an AIFF formal said.
Indian Super League (ISL) franchise FC Goa has authorized a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with three Shillong-based sports golf clubs, it was declared on Tuesday.
